html:
New albums are getting announced and released constantly. It’s tough to stay on top of it all. So that’s where we come in. Pitchfork is tracking notable new music releases with our guide to upcoming albums. In the coming months, there will be big new releases from Panda Bear, Kim Deal, FKA twigs, the Horrors, Father John Misty, Mdou Moctar, Primal Scream, Michael Kiwanuka, Sasami, Mereba, Richard Dawson, the Weather Station, Ethel Cain, Bonnie “Prince” Billy, Saya Gray, and plenty more artists. This guide features streaming and digital release dates and will be updated regularly.

As always, see some of our favorite albums and songs in the Best New Music section. Plus, catch up every Saturday with 10 of our best reviewed albums of the week. Sign up for the 10 to Hear newsletter here.
